advisories.title: Amazon Linux 2 - Livepatch 2.0 - ALAS2LIVEPATCH-2021-041: important priority package update for kernel-livepatch-4.14.214-160.339
advisories.description:
Package updates are available for Amazon Linux 2 - Livepatch that fix the following vulnerabilities:
CVE-2021-3347:
	A flaw was found in the Linux kernel. A use-after-free memory flaw in the Fast Userspace Mutexes functionality allowing a local user to crash the system or escalate their privileges on the system. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to data confidentiality and integrity as well as system availability.
1922249: CVE-2021-3347 kernel: Use after free via PI futex state
